Class Librarian

  • java.lang.Object
    • User
      • Librarian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Librarian
extends User
    This class creates an object for librarian which is a type of user

    1.0.0
    Author:
    Kyriacos and Boris

      • loanACopy

        public static void loanACopy(java.lang.String username,
                             java.lang.String title)
        This method allows librarians to loan copies to users. First it checks if the username and the name of item have been entered properly and exist in the database. Then it checks if the user has any outstanding fines. If there are any the user is not allowed to borrow anything. An additional check is carried out if the resource requested has a free copy which can be borrowed. If there is it automatically gets given to the user.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the user requesting to borrow
        title - title of the resource that has been requested

      • receiveReturn

        public static void receiveReturn(java.lang.String username,
                                 java.lang.String title)
        This method allows the librarian to mark a copy as received then the user returns it. Checks are carried out if such user and resource exist in the database and if the user currently has borrowed this copy. If everything is correct the item is marked as returned.
        Parameters:
        username - username of the user requesting to return
        title - title of the item they wishes to return

      • approveBorrow

        public static void approveBorrow(boolean flag,
                                 Copy curCopy)
        This method approves or does not approve a selected user borrow request from the gui based on the button clicked in the gui.
        Parameters:
        flag - A boolean which decides if the request should be approved or not. It is set by clicking one of the buttons in the gui.
        curCopy - The item that the user has requested to borrow.

      • approveReturn

        public static void approveReturn(boolean flag,
                                 Copy curCopy)
        This method allows the librarian to approve or not approve a return request for a user based on a button clicked in the gui.
        Parameters:
        flag - Boolean which decides if the the request if approved or not. Set by clicking on of the buttons in the gui.
        curCopy - Copy that the user wishes to return.
